articles.title: VZ Introduces 5G Network Slice Solution: Will it Boost Prospects?
articles.mainIdea: VZ Introduces 5G Network Slice Solution: Will it Boost Prospects?
articles.summary: Zacks: VZ Introduces 5G Network Slice Solution: Will it Boost Prospects?. Verizon launches 5G Network Slice Enhanced Internet, offering capped-free high uplink speeds to support AI, cloud apps and enterprise use cases. Related tickers mentioned: T-PA, VZ.

articles.title: Jim Cramer on EchoStar: “I Think the Play Is Over”
articles.mainIdea: Jim Cramer on EchoStar: “I Think the Play Is Over”
articles.summary: Insider Monkey: Jim Cramer on EchoStar: “I Think the Play Is Over”. EchoStar Corporation (NASDAQ:SATS) is one of the stocks Jim Cramer answered questions about. A caller sought Cramer’s opinion on the stock, and he stated: “Oh man, they’ve got a lot of money…. I mean, they sold a lot of product. It’s all about… their bandwidth, their broadband, and they’ve got it, and they sold it, […] Related tickers mentioned: SATS.
